meanings.definition: Observe the sky for signs of weather or celestial events.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I skywatched to see if it would rain.
meanings.sent2: She skywatched every night to spot shooting stars.
meanings.sent3: The cat skywatched the birds flying high above.
meanings.sent4: His eyes skywatched the changing colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: We skywatched the clouds forming different shapes in the sky.

meanings.definition: Past tense of skywatch: to have observed the sky for signs of weather or celestial events.
meanings.sent1: After the storm passed, we skywatched the clear sky.
meanings.sent2: They skywatched the meteor shower last summer.
meanings.sent3: The kids skywatched the moon disappear behind the clouds.
meanings.sent4: She skywatched the stars twinkle in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: He skywatched the sunrise paint the sky with vibrant colors.
